summary: A web app for the Blue Panthers sports team (based in Jackman, Maine) with sign-up functionality and an owner/admin dashboard to view sign-ups.
architectural_notes: App includes a sign-up flow for Blue Panthers team members
Owner/admin dashboard page required to display sign-up list

existing_features.title: Add a React Query hook in useQueries.ts to fetch all sign-ups from the backend using the new getAllSignUps query function.

Create an Owner Dashboard page (frontend/src/pages/OwnerDashboard.tsx) that requires Internet Identity login to access. Once authenticated, display a table of all sign-ups showing each player's name, email, phone, age, position, and experience level. If not logged in, show a login prompt with an Internet Identity sign-in button. Style the page consistently with the existing navy and gold Blue Panthers design system.
Add a navigation link or route in App.tsx so the Owner Dashboard page is reachable (e.g., via a discreet 'Owner Login' link in the footer or header).

new_feature_requests.summary: Owner/admin page to view all users who signed up for the Blue Panthers
Add a backend query function that returns all sign-up records stored in the map, including each player's ID, name, email, phone, age, position, and experience level.
